title: Create - Compensation Guardian Role
body:
Role:Compensation Guardian

Purpose: To ensure compensation payment proposals match approved governance records.

Domains: 
- Team Compensation Table (https://www.notion.so/Team-Compensation-Table-e56cc66842ae4bcebf5d36b2233f4975) 

Accountabilities:

- Keep Team Compensation Table fully up-to-date. (https://www.notion.so/Team-Compensation-Table-e56cc66842ae4bcebf5d36b2233f4975) 
- Notify the community if someone is trying to submit a compensation proposal that is out of line with governance records and gather enough support to stop the proposal from passing.

Checklist Items:

- Check for new compensation proposals at least every couple days.
- Update table with any newly approved compensation proposals.
author: 0x380C7200892581b7392CA00DA759A4072B67460D
